workshop.title: Oracle Application Express
workshop.description: This series of hands-on labs is designed to teach you how to build applications using Application Express. The primary vehicle for teaching is a single use case which is expanded on with each lab.

labs.title: Trial Account Student Guide
labs.description: This Student Guide should be reviewed if you acquired a Trial Account from Oracle. It provides the required Workshop guidance and prerequisites

labs.title: Lab 100: Agile Project Management
labs.description: Use Developer Cloud Service to create issues, tasks, and sprints

labs.title: Lab 200: Continuous Delivery of Java Microservices
labs.description: Access Developer Cloud Service, Import external GIT Repository, Import project into Elicpse, and Build and Delpoy a project using Developer Cloud Service and Oracle Application Container Cloud Service.

labs.title: Lab 300: Continuous Delivery of Database Microservices
labs.description: Access Developer Cloud Service, Import external GIT Repository, and Build and Delpoy a project using Developer Cloud Service and Oracle Application Container Cloud Service.

labs.title: Lab 400: Cloud Native Rapid Javascript Devlopment with node.js
labs.description: Access Developer Cloud Service, Import Code from external Git Repository, Import Project into Brackets, then Build and Deploy project using Developer Cloud Service and Oracle Application Container Cloud Service

labs.title: Lab 500: Oracle Developer Cloud Service Administration
labs.description: Access Developer Cloud Service, Complete Sprint, Run Backlog and Sprint Reports and Review Administrative Tasks
